title: petulino
author: petulino
content: Real Website: https://www.orbiter.finance/Scam link: Code:https://orbiter.pm/Official Discord:  https://discord.gg/orbiter-financeOrbiter finance (A layer 2 Bridge) official discord has been hacked and hacker have posted scam website link to claim airdrop. i opened website and it asking for connect wallet to claim airdrop. This is full scam link and if you connect your wallet your wallet will be empty in second. Please be careful our Bitcointalk community and also share with your crypto friend and family.Why its important:There was rumors that Arbiter finance will launch token because they have got so much fund from bridge fee and this bridge is widely used for bridge purpose. it's provide Zksync, arbitrum, polygon zkevm, starknet and many other and it will save 20$ than official bridge. Many newbie just joined for airdrop purpose and they can be scammed very easily from this phising attempt from official discord server .
